page.title: 19OTTERY'S SERVICES
page.content: During the year the girls made articles in the needlecraft lessons and these were sold to parents at a Grand Sale of Work. SHOPS.Fifty years ago the shops were very much smaller than they are today and there was no self_service. There were many more grocers, 7 or 8 bakers 4 or 5 butchers who all killed their own meat, 4 blacksmiths, a men's tailor,a milliners and a photographic studio. SERVICES. There was a resident police sergeant and two constables. For many years the Police Station was at the Priory which is now an old people's home. Today's library occupies the old town hall. The fire engine was pulled by the two council horses which were kept in a field off Longdogs Lane. Two rockets
